data.title: DAWN EAGLES RISING
data.meta_description: Aces High are the world's foremost specialists in Military and Aviation Art with major Galleries in the UK, USA and France.
data.text:
The Limited Edition

Every print has been personally signed by the artist together with three Luftwaffe Knight’s Cross fighter Aces who, between them, have a total 493 air combat victories:

Generalleutnant Günther Rall KC with Oak Leaves and Swords

Leutnant Hugo Broch KC

Oberleutnant Walter Wolfrum KC

Multi-Signed Limited Edition

With all the signatures of the Limited Edition, this print has been multi-signed by high ranking Luftwaffe pilots to make it a NINE signature edition:

Oberleutnant Rolf Ebhardt

Feldwebel Heinz Radlauer IC

Obergefreiter Ernst Specht IC 1st Class

Hauptmann Karl-Fritz Schlossstein GCiG

Oberleutnant Walter Schuck KC with Oak Leaves

Hauptmann Günther Nordenholtz

Matted Limied Edition

With all signatures of the Limited Edition, our expert team have conservation mounted this FOUR signature collector'spiece to include the original autograph of an additional Luftwaffe fighter Aces bringing the total number of air combat victories up to 699:

Oberleutnant Walter Schuck KC with Oak Leaves

The Luftwaffe Tribute Edition

In addition to the three signatures of the Limited Edition, each copy of the Luftwaffe Tribute Edition has been individually signed by a further fifteen Luftwaffe fighter pilots, including nine holders of the Knight’s Cross, making a total of EIGHTEEN signatures in total.

Oberfeldwebel Erich Axthammer

Leutnant Helmut Ballewski IC

Major Hans-Ekkehard Bob KC

Unteroffizier Gustav Drees

Leutnant Norbert Hannig IC

Feldwebel Herbert Koller

Leutnant Wilhelm Noller KC

Hauptmann Günther Nordenholtz

Unteroffizier Johannes Oesterhelt

Oberfeldwebel Willi Reschke KC

Unteroffizier Otfried Sahl

Oberleutnant Ernst Scheufele

Hauptmann Karl-Fritz Schlossstein GCiG

Oberleutnant Walter Schuck KC with Oak Leaves

Oberleutnant Günther Seeger KC

The Artist Proofs

The THIRTY-THREE signature Artist Proofs are issued together with all the components of the Limited edition, and are also matted to include the original signatures of some of the most prominent fighter Aces of the War, some of the Luftwaffe greatest name. This outstanding special edition is conservation matted and ready to frame and includes THIRTY THREE original signatures who amassed a staggering total of 2741 victories between them:
